data.marketing-features-title: andCards: Pricing — price plans for users, coworkings, enterprise
data.marketing-features-description: Free download for individual users, low cost for coworkings and affordable subscription for companies. Start building your own community right now with a free trial!
data.marketing-features-paragraph: You've got it right, andCards Community costs only 5 cents per user per day!
data.marketing-features-personal-description: Keep your contacts up-to-date, join communities and network at events
data.marketing-features-community-description: Everything your community needs to grow: directory, events, announcements, and more.
data.marketing-features-enterprise-descriptio: Custom solution for large companies: integrations, SSO, priority support
